name: Triple Dungeon
description:
Sure, you've delved into some harrowing dungeons - but have you ever attempted it three times simultaneously? Your mind will explode attempting to concentrate in this insanely innovative roguelike by Wainstop! Featuring tons of characters to rescue and then play as, heaps of quests, achievements, leaderboards, different weapon types, and a WHOLE lot more! Play in the classic 'Quest Mode' and try to get as far as you can with any one single character, or jump into the SPEED mode - you've got 60 seconds to get as far as you can, and your combined depth of all 3 adventurers is your score!

With full Xbox 360 controller support!
